RAW.SOURCE:
` *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Report ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR *&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT zaplink_release MESSAGE-ID zaplink_devtools.
TYPE-POOLS : icon, abap, seoc.
SELECTION-SCREEN BEGIN OF BLOCK param WITH FRAME TITLE text-bpa. PARAMETERS p_incl TYPE programm OBLIGATORY DEFAULT 'ZAPLINK_INSTALLER_MASTER_CL'. PARAMETERS p_overw TYPE flag AS CHECKBOX. PARAMETERS p_prog TYPE programm DEFAULT 'ZAPLINK_INSTALLER'. PARAMETERS p_master TYPE programm OBLIGATORY DEFAULT 'ZAPLINK_INSTALLER_MASTER'. SELECTION-SCREEN END OF BLOCK param.
SELECTION-SCREEN BEGIN OF BLOCK files WITH FRAME TITLE text-bfi. PARAMETERS p_path TYPE zaplink_synchronizer=>td_directoryname OBLIGATORY LOWER CASE DEFAULT 'C:\'. PARAMETERS: d_extfn TYPE zaplink_file=>td_filename LOWER CASE MODIF ID dsp, d_devfn TYPE zaplink_file=>td_filename LOWER CASE MODIF ID dsp, d_othfn TYPE zaplink_file=>td_filename LOWER CASE MODIF ID dsp, d_contfn TYPE zaplink_file=>td_filename LOWER CASE MODIF ID dsp, d_instfn TYPE zaplink_file=>td_filename LOWER CASE MODIF ID dsp. SELECTION-SCREEN END OF BLOCK files.
SELECTION-SCREEN BEGIN OF BLOCK actions WITH FRAME TITLE text-bac. PARAMETERS p_a_act TYPE abap_bool AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT abap_true. PARAMETERS p_a_use TYPE abap_bool AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT abap_true. PARAMETERS p_a_chk TYPE abap_bool AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT abap_true. PARAMETERS p_a_nfo TYPE abap_bool AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT abap_true. PARAMETERS p_a_ins TYPE abap_bool AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT abap_true. PARAMETERS p_a_ext TYPE abap_bool AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT abap_true. SELECTION-SCREEN END OF BLOCK actions.
TYPES td_sourcecode TYPE zaplink_standalone_generator=>tt_abaprawsource. CONSTANTS: c_prog_nfo_sa TYPE zaplink_standalone_generator=>td_progname VALUE 'ZAPLINK_INFOS_STANDALONE', c_prog_ext_sa TYPE zaplink_standalone_generator=>td_progname VALUE 'ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR_STANDALONE', c_temp_pack TYPE zaplink_standalone_generator=>td_devclass VALUE 'ZAPLINK-TEMP', c_tutorial_pack TYPE zaplink_standalone_generator=>td_devclass VALUE 'ZAPLINK-TUTORIALS', c_devtools_pack TYPE zaplink_standalone_generator=>td_devclass VALUE 'ZAPLINK-DEVTOOLS', c_gen_pack TYPE zaplink_standalone_generator=>td_devclass VALUE 'ZAPLINK-GENERATED'. * c_stand_a TYPE trdir-name VALUE 'ZAPLINK_STANDALONE_CREATE', * c_installer TYPE trdir-name VALUE 'ZAPLINK_INSTALLER_CREATE', * c_usecase TYPE trdir-name VALUE 'YTBE_USECASEINDEX', * c_sgen TYPE trdir-name VALUE 'YTBE_SGEN'.
*INITIALIZATION. * BREAK-POINT. * LOOP AT SCREEN. * IF screen-name = 'DE_EXTFN'. BREAK-POINT. ENDIF. * ENDLOOP. * *AT SELECTION-SCREEN. * BREAK-POINT. * LOOP AT SCREEN. * IF screen-name = 'DE_EXTFN'. BREAK-POINT. ENDIF. * ENDLOOP. * AT SELECTION-SCREEN OUTPUT. LOOP AT SCREEN. IF screen-group1 = 'DSP'. screen-input = 0. MODIFY SCREEN. ENDIF. ENDLOOP. PERFORM update_filenames.
START-OF-SELECTION. DATA d_name TYPE trdir-name. DATA t_keys TYPE zaplink_tools=>tt_compkeys. * DATA r_srcsystem TYPE zaplink_tools=>tr_srcsystem. * DATA r_type TYPE zaplink_tools=>tr_comptype. * DATA r_name TYPE zaplink_tools=>tr_compname. DATA r_packages TYPE zaplink_tools=>tr_packages. * DATA r_author TYPE zaplink_tools=>tr_author. * DATA s_type LIKE LINE OF r_type. DATA s_package LIKE LINE OF r_packages. DATA classkey TYPE seoclskey. DATA t_code TYPE td_sourcecode. DATA o_file TYPE REF TO zaplink_file. DATA d_content TYPE string. DATA s_programs TYPE zaplink_installer_create=>ts_programs. DATA s_selection TYPE zaplink_installer_create=>ts_selection. DATA s_key LIKE LINE OF s_selection-keys. DATA s_files TYPE zaplink_installer_create=>ts_files. DATA o_cx TYPE REF TO cx_root. DATA o_zlcx TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx. DATA o_activ TYPE REF TO zaplink_activate. * DATA t_programs TYPE zaplink_tools=>tt_gensetc. DATA t_keys_ko TYPE zaplink_activate=>tt_compkeys. DATA d_count TYPE i. DATA o_usecase TYPE REF TO zaplink_usecaseindex. DATA o_generator TYPE REF TO zaplink_standalone_generator. DATA abapcode TYPE zaplink_standalone_generator=>tt_abaprawsource. DATA o_installer TYPE REF TO zaplink_installer_create. DATA o_log TYPE REF TO zaplink_message_collector. DATA d_regenflag TYPE abap_bool. DATA o_oo_cx TYPE REF TO cl_oo_exception_class. DATA clstype TYPE seoclstype. DATA class TYPE vseoclass. DATA d_bal_sobj TYPE balsubobj. DATA d_bal_extn TYPE balnrext. DATA o_cont TYPE REF TO zaplink_container. DATA o_objects TYPE REF TO zaplink_list. DATA t_data TYPE zaplink_container=>ts_contdata. DATA t_trdirt TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF trdirt. DATA s_trdirt LIKE LINE OF t_trdirt. FIELD-SYMBOLS: <k> LIKE LINE OF t_keys.
*modify trdirti *modify TRDIRT SELECT * INTO TABLE t_trdirt FROM trdirt WHERE name = 'ZAPLINK'. CONCATENATE 'ZAPLINK V' zaplink_datatypes=>framework_version INTO s_trdirt-text. MODIFY t_trdirt FROM s_trdirt TRANSPORTING text WHERE text IS INITIAL OR text IS NOT INITIAL. MODIFY trdirt FROM TABLE t_trdirt. COMMIT WORK.
PERFORM update_filenames. s_package-sign = 'I'. s_package-option = 'EQ'. s_package-low = 'ZAPLINK'. APPEND s_package TO r_packages. * SGEN : Activate all comp * t_keys = zaplink_tools=>get_keys_from_tadir( srcsystem = r_srcsystem * type = r_type * name = r_name * packages = r_packages * ext = abap_true * author = r_author ). t_keys = zaplink_tools=>get_keys_from_tadir( packages = r_packages ext = abap_true ). * Not only programs but also dictionary component * t_programs = zaplink_tools=>conv_compkey_2_proglist( t_keys ). * t_programs = zaplink_tools=>check_valid_proglist( t_programs ). * t_keys = zaplink_tools=>conv_proglist_2_compkey( t_programs ). DELETE t_keys WHERE type = 'PROG' AND name = sy-repid. " remove myself d_count = LINES( t_keys ). IF NOT p_a_act IS INITIAL. CALL FUNCTION 'SAPGUI_PROGRESS_INDICATOR' EXPORTING percentage = 1 text = text-psg. * SELECT SINGLE name INTO d_name * FROM trdir * WHERE name = c_sgen. * IF sy-subrc = 0. * SUBMIT (c_sgen) * WITH p_sgen = abap_true * WITH p_comp = 'HOME' * WITH s_devc IN r_packages[] * WITH p_lsmw = abap_false * WITH p_$tmp = abap_false * AND RETURN. * ENDIF. CREATE OBJECT o_activ EXPORTING obj_list = t_keys. t_keys_ko = o_activ->activate( ). IF t_keys_ko IS INITIAL. d_content = d_count. * &1 component(s) succefully activated MESSAGE i016 WITH d_content INTO d_content. WRITE:/ d_content. ELSE. WRITE:/ 'List of components with errors'(sko). LOOP AT t_keys_ko ASSIGNING <k>. WRITE:/ <k>-type, <k>-name. ENDLOOP. ENDIF.
WRITE:/ sy-uline. ENDIF.
* Update UseCase IF NOT p_a_use IS INITIAL. CALL FUNCTION 'SAPGUI_PROGRESS_INDICATOR' EXPORTING percentage = 25 text = text-puc. * SELECT SINGLE name INTO d_name * FROM trdir * WHERE name = c_usecase. * IF sy-subrc = 0. * SUBMIT (c_usecase) * WITH p_comp = 'HOME' * WITH s_devc = 'ZAPLINK*' * AND RETURN. * ENDIF. TRY. CREATE OBJECT o_usecase. o_usecase->add_keys( t_keys ). o_usecase->update_index( ). CATCH zaplink_cx INTO o_zlcx. WRITE:/ 'Usecase update exception :'(cxu). o_zlcx->write( ). WRITE:/ sy-uline. ENDTRY. ENDIF.
* Regenerate sections : Also Regenerate Exception class constructors if needed IF NOT p_a_chk IS INITIAL. CALL FUNCTION 'SAPGUI_PROGRESS_INDICATOR' EXPORTING percentage = 40 text = text-prs. t_keys_ko = t_keys. d_bal_sobj = sy-repid. DELETE t_keys_ko WHERE type <> 'CLAS'. LOOP AT t_keys_ko ASSIGNING <k>. classkey-clsname = d_bal_extn = <k>-name.
CALL FUNCTION 'SEO_CLIF_GET' EXPORTING cifkey = classkey IMPORTING clstype = clstype class = class EXCEPTIONS not_existing = 1 deleted = 2. IF sy-subrc = 1. MESSAGE ID sy-msgid TYPE sy-msgty NUMBER sy-msgno WITH sy-msgv1 sy-msgv2 sy-msgv3 sy-msgv4 INTO d_content. WRITE:/ icon_light_out AS ICON, d_content. ENDIF. CHECK sy-subrc = 0.
CREATE OBJECT o_log. CALL METHOD o_log->init EXPORTING id_object = zaplink_datatypes=>ballog_object id_subobject = d_bal_sobj id_extnumber = d_bal_extn auto_upd_custo = abap_true id_activity = zaplink_message_collector=>actions-create EXCEPTIONS error = 1 OTHERS = 2. TRY. CALL METHOD zaplink_object=>check_class_sections EXPORTING classkey = classkey application_log = o_log. IF o_log->has_messages_of_msgt( 'W' ) = abap_true. d_regenflag = abap_true. WRITE:/ 'Class'(cls), classkey-clsname. CALL FUNCTION 'SEO_CLIF_SAVE_ALL' EXPORTING cifkey = classkey * NO_SECTIONS = SEOX_FALSE sections_only = seox_true EXCEPTIONS not_existing = 1 nothing_to_do = 2 access_error = 3 db_error = 4 error_in_code_generation = 5 OTHERS = 6. IF sy-subrc <> 0. o_log->add_symsg( ). ENDIF. o_log->write( ). ENDIF. CATCH zaplink_cx_connector INTO o_zlcx. d_regenflag = abap_true. WRITE:/ 'Classe'(cls), classkey-clsname. o_zlcx->write( ). ENDTRY.
IF clstype = seoc_clstype_class AND class-category = seoc_category_exception. CREATE OBJECT o_oo_cx EXPORTING clskey = classkey. IF o_oo_cx->check_constructor( ) = abap_false. d_regenflag = abap_true. WRITE:/ 'Exception Class'(cxs), classkey-clsname, 'Constructor rebuild'(crb). o_oo_cx->create_constructor_definition( ). CALL FUNCTION 'SEO_CLIF_SAVE_ALL' EXPORTING cifkey = classkey * NO_SECTIONS = SEOX_FALSE * sections_only = seox_true EXCEPTIONS not_existing = 1 nothing_to_do = 2 access_error = 3 db_error = 4 error_in_code_generation = 5 OTHERS = 6. IF sy-subrc <> 0. WRITE:/ 'SEO_CLIF_SAVE_ALL', classkey, d_content. ENDIF. ENDIF. ENDIF.
ENDLOOP.
IF NOT d_regenflag IS INITIAL. WRITE:/ 'Some classes have been regenerated. Please restart this program.'(gen). COMMIT WORK AND WAIT. EXIT. ENDIF. ENDIF.
* Generate ZL_infos standalone IF NOT p_a_nfo IS INITIAL. CALL FUNCTION 'SAPGUI_PROGRESS_INDICATOR' EXPORTING percentage = 60 text = text-pis. * SELECT SINGLE name INTO d_name * FROM trdir * WHERE name = c_stand_a. * IF sy-subrc = 0. * SUBMIT (c_stand_a) * WITH p_prog = 'ZAPLINK_INFOS_STANDALONE' * WITH p_master = 'ZAPLINK_INFOS' * WITH p_devc = 'ZAPLINK-FRAMEWORK-CORE' * AND RETURN. * ENDIF. TRY. CREATE OBJECT o_generator EXPORTING master = 'ZAPLINK_INFOS'. o_generator->add_connectors( ). o_generator->generate( ). o_generator->save_report( report = c_prog_nfo_sa package = c_gen_pack ). REFRESH t_keys. s_key-type = 'PROG'. s_key-name = c_prog_nfo_sa. APPEND s_key TO t_keys. CREATE OBJECT o_activ EXPORTING obj_list = t_keys. t_keys_ko = o_activ->activate( ). IF t_keys_ko IS INITIAL. WRITE:/ 'Generated program :'(gpr), c_prog_nfo_sa. ELSE. WRITE:/ 'List of components with errors'(sko). LOOP AT t_keys_ko ASSIGNING <k>. WRITE:/ <k>-type, <k>-name. ENDLOOP. ENDIF.
CATCH zaplink_cx INTO o_zlcx. WRITE:/ 'ZL_Infos Stand Alone Generation exception :'(cxn). o_zlcx->write( ). ENDTRY. ENDIF.
* Installer IF NOT p_a_ins IS INITIAL. CALL FUNCTION 'SAPGUI_PROGRESS_INDICATOR' EXPORTING percentage = 70 text = text-pin. * SELECT SINGLE name INTO d_name * FROM trdir * WHERE name = c_installer. * IF sy-subrc = 0. * SUBMIT (c_installer) * WITH p_incl = p_incl * WITH p_overw = p_overw * WITH p_prog = p_prog * WITH d_fn = d_contfn * WITH d_ifn = d_instfn * WITH p_master = p_master * WITH s_pack IN r_packages[] * AND RETURN. * ENDIF. s_programs-master = p_master. s_programs-include = p_incl. s_programs-program = p_prog. s_programs-package = '$TMP'.
s_package-sign = 'E'. s_package-option = 'EQ'. s_package-low = c_tutorial_pack. APPEND s_package TO r_packages. s_package-sign = 'E'. s_package-option = 'EQ'. s_package-low = c_devtools_pack. APPEND s_package TO r_packages. s_package-sign = 'E'. s_package-option = 'EQ'. s_package-low = c_temp_pack. APPEND s_package TO r_packages. s_package-sign = 'E'. s_package-option = 'EQ'. s_package-low = c_gen_pack. APPEND s_package TO r_packages. s_selection-packages = r_packages. s_key-type = 'PROG'. s_key-name = c_prog_nfo_sa. APPEND s_key TO s_selection-keys.
s_files-container = d_contfn. s_files-installer = d_instfn.
CREATE OBJECT o_installer. TRY. o_installer->set_parameters( programs = s_programs overwrite = p_overw selection = s_selection files = s_files ). o_installer->create_installer( ). CATCH zaplink_cx INTO o_zlcx. WRITE:/ 'Install Generator exception :'(cxi). o_zlcx->write( ). ENDTRY.
DELETE r_packages WHERE sign = 'I'. s_package-sign = 'I'. MODIFY r_packages FROM s_package TRANSPORTING sign WHERE sign <> s_package-sign. DELETE r_packages WHERE low CP '*DEVTOOLS*'. t_keys = zaplink_tools=>get_keys_from_tadir( packages = r_packages ext = abap_false ). CONCATENATE 'ZAPLINK Other objects version'(ott) zaplink_datatypes=>framework_version ` - ` sy-datum sy-uzeit INTO t_data-name. CREATE OBJECT o_file. o_file->set_filetype( zaplink_file=>filetypes-local ). o_file->set_filename( d_othfn ).
CREATE OBJECT o_objects . o_objects->add_keys( t_keys ). o_objects->select_default( zaplink_list=>sel_actions-export ). o_cont = zaplink_container=>create_new( data = t_data o_file = o_file ). o_cont->add_components( o_objects ). o_cont->save_to_file( ). * o_objects = o_cont->get_content( ). * write:/ 'Developer tools content :'(dtc). * o_objects->write( ).
r_packages = s_selection-packages. DELETE r_packages WHERE sign = 'I'. DELETE r_packages WHERE NOT low CP '*DEVTOOLS*'. s_package-sign = 'I'. MODIFY r_packages FROM s_package TRANSPORTING sign WHERE sign <> s_package-sign. t_keys = zaplink_tools=>get_keys_from_tadir( packages = r_packages ext = abap_false ). CONCATENATE 'ZAPLINK Devlopper tools version'(dvt) zaplink_datatypes=>framework_version ` - ` sy-datum sy-uzeit INTO t_data-name. CREATE OBJECT o_file. o_file->set_filetype( zaplink_file=>filetypes-local ). o_file->set_filename( d_devfn ).
CREATE OBJECT o_objects . o_objects->add_keys( t_keys ). o_objects->select_default( zaplink_list=>sel_actions-export ). o_cont = zaplink_container=>create_new( data = t_data o_file = o_file ). o_cont->add_components( o_objects ). o_cont->save_to_file( ). * o_objects = o_cont->get_content( ). * write:/ 'Developer tools content :'(dtc). * o_objects->write( ).
ENDIF.
* StandAlone Extractor IF NOT p_a_ext IS INITIAL. CALL FUNCTION 'SAPGUI_PROGRESS_INDICATOR' EXPORTING percentage = 85 text = text-pin. * SELECT SINGLE name INTO d_name * FROM trdir * WHERE name = c_stand_a. * IF sy-subrc = 0. * SUBMIT (c_stand_a) * WITH p_prog = 'ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR_STANDALONE' * WITH p_master = 'ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR' * WITH p_devc = '$TMP' * AND RETURN. * READ REPORT 'ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR_STANDALONE' INTO t_code. * IF sy-subrc = 0. * CREATE OBJECT o_file. * o_file->set_filetype( zaplink_file=>filetypes-local ). * o_file->set_filename( d_extfn ). * d_content = zaplink_tools=>table_2_string( t_code ). * o_file->set_filecontent( d_content ). * o_file->save( ). * ENDIF. * ENDIF. TRY. CREATE OBJECT o_generator EXPORTING master = 'ZAPLINK_EXTRACTOR'. o_generator->add_connectors( ). abapcode = o_generator->generate( ). o_generator->save_report( report = c_prog_ext_sa package = c_gen_pack ).
REFRESH t_keys. s_key-type = 'PROG'. s_key-name = c_prog_ext_sa. APPEND s_key TO t_keys. CREATE OBJECT o_activ EXPORTING obj_list = t_keys. t_keys_ko = o_activ->activate( ). IF t_keys_ko IS INITIAL. WRITE:/ 'Generated program :'(gpr), c_prog_ext_sa. ELSE. WRITE:/ 'List of components with errors'(sko). LOOP AT t_keys_ko ASSIGNING <k>. WRITE:/ <k>-type, <k>-name. ENDLOOP. ENDIF.
CREATE OBJECT o_file. o_file->set_filetype( zaplink_file=>filetypes-local ). o_file->set_filename( d_extfn ). d_content = zaplink_tools=>table_2_string( abapcode ). o_file->set_filecontent( d_content ). o_file->save( ). CATCH zaplink_cx INTO o_zlcx. WRITE:/ 'ZL_Extractor Stand Alone Generation exception :'(cxx). o_zlcx->write( ). ENDTRY. ENDIF.
END-OF-SELECTION. *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Form UPDATE_FILENAMES *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM update_filenames . CONCATENATE p_path 'ZAPLink Framework'(frm) zaplink_datatypes=>ext_sep 'Devtools'(dts) zaplink_datatypes=>ext_sep 'V'(ver) zaplink_datatypes=>framework_version zaplink_datatypes=>ext_sep zaplink_datatypes=>file_ext INTO d_devfn. CONCATENATE p_path 'ZAPLink Framework'(frm) zaplink_datatypes=>ext_sep 'Others'(oth) zaplink_datatypes=>ext_sep 'V'(ver) zaplink_datatypes=>framework_version zaplink_datatypes=>ext_sep zaplink_datatypes=>file_ext INTO d_othfn. CONCATENATE p_path 'ZAPLink Framework'(frm) zaplink_datatypes=>ext_sep 'V'(ver) zaplink_datatypes=>framework_version zaplink_datatypes=>ext_sep zaplink_datatypes=>file_ext INTO d_contfn. CONCATENATE p_path 'ZAPLink Framework'(frm) zaplink_datatypes=>ext_sep 'Installer'(ins) zaplink_datatypes=>ext_sep 'ABAP Program'(aba) zaplink_datatypes=>ext_sep 'V'(ver) zaplink_datatypes=>framework_version zaplink_datatypes=>ext_sep 'txt' INTO d_instfn. CONCATENATE p_path 'ZAPLink Framework'(frm) zaplink_datatypes=>ext_sep 'Extractor Standalone'(est) zaplink_datatypes=>ext_sep 'ABAP Program'(aba) zaplink_datatypes=>ext_sep 'V'(ver) zaplink_datatypes=>framework_version zaplink_datatypes=>ext_sep 'txt' INTO d_extfn. ENDFORM. " UPDATE_FILENAMES

ITEM.ENTRY: Some classes have been regenerated. Please restart this program.
ZAPLink : Task to do for building new release of the Framework
ZAPLink : Extraction en masse de componsants
